  • hide the fruits of your work 㥯 in a mound 阝
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 隐)
Ideographic: A place 阝 to hide when worried 㥯
Antonyms: 現
purpleculture_examples:
隱患 [ yǐn huàn ]: a danger concealed within sth; hidden damage; misfortune not visible from the surface
隱藏 [ yǐn cáng ]: to hide; to conceal; to mask; to shelter; to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden); to hide oneself; to lie low; to nestle; hidden; implicit; private; covert; recessed (lighting)
隱隱 [ yǐn yǐn ]: faint; indistinct
隱瞞 [ yǐn mán ]: to conceal; to hide (a taboo subject); to cover up the truth
隱蔽 [ yǐn bì ]: to conceal; to hide; covert; under cover

    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
    • 㥯 [ yǐn ] careful, prudent; compassionate; grieved; worried
heisig_chinese_memo: The pinnacle has a hidden heartbreak hotel for people who want to have sex to feel better after a break up but are too ashamed to tell people.
Ru_trainchinese: yǐn: (глаг/прил/сущ) прятать, скрывать; прикрывать; скрытый; неясный; тайна, приватность
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: No need to feel anxious at the pinnacle.  It's location is so high and hidden that no one can invade.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " 𨸏 ", "㥯" sound, the original meaning is concealment. "Shuowen": "Hidden. From 𨸏, 㥯 sound." "Yi‧Kun": "Heaven and earth change, vegetation and trees, heaven and earth closed, wise men hidden."

" Hidden " can mean concealment. "The Analects of Confucius-Zilu": "The father is hidden by the son, and the son is hidden by the father, standing in it."

" Hidden " also means cover. "Zuo Zhuan‧ Eighteen Years of Wengong": "The former emperor Hong's had talented scholars, who concealed righteousness and hidden thieves, so that they could behave fiercely."

" Yin " also expresses subtlety. "Yi‧Xi Ci Shang": "Explore, explore, and hook profoundly."

" Hidden " also means people living in seclusion and seclusion. "Yi·Qian": "Dragon Virtue is also hermit." Kong Yingdashu: "Sages have Dragon Virtue and hermits." Beiqi Yanzhi's "Family Precepts of the Yan Family: Homecoming": "Confucianism has unyielding princes and noble deeds. Let Wang Ci avoid the mountains and forests of the world."

" Hidden " can also express sadness. "Songs of the Chu‧Nine Chapters‧Sorrowful Wind": "Who can think but not hide, according to what Peng Xianzhi has heard." Wang Yi's note: "Hidden, worry too."

" Hidden " can also mean sympathy. "Mencius·Lianghui King": "If Wang concealed his innocence and died, then what would the cattle and sheep choose?" Zhao Qi's note: "Hidden, pain." Yang Bojun's note: "Sorrow, pitiful."

" Hidden " also refers to audit. "Guan Zi‧ Forbidden from Tibet": "It is the reason that a gentleman who looks up to the unreasonable is afraid of himself, and the person who is not up to look down is also hidden." Yin Zhizhang's note: "Hidden, but also.

" Hidden " can also refer to cryptic words. Hidden words, riddles. "Historical Records: Funny Biographies": "When King Qi Wei was happy to hide." Sima Zhensuoyin: "Hiyin is a good secret."
humanum_short_description_en: From " 𨸏 ", "㥯" sound, the original meaning is concealment.
humanum_full_description:
從「𨸏」，「㥯」聲，本義為隱蔽。《說文》：「蔽也。从𨸏，㥯聲。」 《易‧坤》：「天地變化，草木蕃，天地閉，賢人隱。」

　　「隱」可表示隱瞞。《論語‧子路》：「父為子隱，子為父隱，直在其中矣。」

　　「隱」也表示掩護。《左傳‧文公十八年》：「昔帝鴻氏有不才子，掩義隱賊，好行凶德。」楊伯峻注：「意謂掩蔽仁義，包庇姦賊。」

　　「隱」還表示微妙。《易‧繫辭上》：「探賾索隱，鉤深致遠。」

　　「隱」亦表示隱居及隱居的人。《易‧乾》：「龍德而隱者也。」孔穎達疏：「聖人有龍德隱居者也。」北齊顏之推《顏氏家訓‧歸心》：「儒有不屈王侯高尚其事，隱有讓王辭相避世山林。」

　　「隱」還能表示憂傷。《楚辭‧九章‧悲回風》：「孰能思而不隱兮，照彭咸之所聞。」王逸注：「隱，憂也。」

　　「隱」還可指同情。《孟子‧梁惠王上》：「王若隱其無罪而就死地，則牛羊何擇焉？」趙岐注：「隱，痛也。」楊伯峻注：「哀痛，可憐。」

　　「隱」亦指審核。《管子‧禁藏》：「是故君子上觀絕理者以自恐也，下觀不及者以自隱也。」尹知章注：「隱，度也。」

　　「隱」也可指隱語。隱語，謎語。《史記‧滑稽列傳》：「齊威王之時喜隱。」司馬貞索隱：「喜隱謂好隱語。」

    English Definition: secret; hidden; concealed; (prefix) crypto-
    Example Words:
    隱患 [ yǐn huàn ]: a danger concealed within sth; hidden damage; misfortune not visible from the surface
    隱藏 [ yǐn cáng ]: to hide; to conceal; to mask; to shelter; to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden); to hide oneself; to lie low; to nestle; hidden; implicit; private; covert; recessed (lighting)
    隱隱 [ yǐn yǐn ]: faint; indistinct
    隱瞞 [ yǐn mán ]: to conceal; to hide (a taboo subject); to cover up the truth
    隱蔽 [ yǐn bì ]: to conceal; to hide; covert; under cover
    More: 隱* | *隱 | *隱*
  • Pinyin: yìn

    English Definition: to lean upon

Chinese: The pinnacle has a hidden heartbreak hotel for people who want to have sex to feel better after a break up but are too ashamed to tell people.
Meaning: hidden
Hanzi: 隐
Story: No need to feel anxious at the pinnacle. It's location is so high and hidden that no one can invade.
Kind: traditional

從「 𨸏 」，「 㥯 」聲，本義為隱蔽。《說文》：「蔽也。从𨸏，㥯聲。」 《易‧坤》：「天地變化，草木蕃，天地閉，賢人隱。」 「 隱 」可表示隱瞞。《論語‧子路》：「父為子隱，子為父隱，直在其中矣。」 「 隱 」也表示掩護。《左傳‧文公十八年》：「昔帝鴻氏有不才子，掩義隱賊，好行凶德。」楊伯峻注：「意謂掩蔽仁義，包庇姦賊。」 「 隱 」還表示微妙。《易‧繫辭上》：「探賾索隱，鉤深致遠。」 「 隱 」亦表示隱居及隱居的人。《易‧乾》：「龍德而隱者也。」孔穎達疏：「聖人有龍德隱居者也。」北齊顏之推《顏氏家訓‧歸心》：「儒有不屈王侯高尚其事，隱有讓王辭相避世山林。」 「 隱 」還能表示憂傷。《楚辭‧九章‧悲回風》：「孰能思而不隱兮，照彭咸之所聞。」王逸注：「隱，憂也。」 「 隱 」還可指同情。《孟子‧梁惠王上》：「王若隱其無罪而就死地，則牛羊何擇焉？」趙岐注：「隱，痛也。」楊伯峻注：「哀痛，可憐。」 「 隱 」亦指審核。《管子‧禁藏》：「是故君子上觀絕理者以自恐也，下觀不及者以自隱也。」尹知章注：「隱，度也。」 「 隱 」也可指隱語。隱語，謎語。《史記‧滑稽列傳》：「齊威王之時喜隱。」司馬貞索隱：「喜隱謂好隱語。」

隱字的基本解释

隱
yǐn

隱
yìn
均见“隐”。

隱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐn］
［《廣韻》於謹切，上隠，影。］
“隐1”的繁体字。亦作“隠1”。
(1)隐蔽；隐藏。
(2)掩蔽；掩护。
(3)隐讳；隐瞞。
(4)精深；微妙。
(5)灯或火熄灭。
(6)隐没。
(7)隐居。
(8)指隐居的人。
(9)幽静。参见“隱深”。
(10)穷。
(11)忧伤；疾苦。
(12)哀怜；同情。
(13)审核；审度。
(14)用同“穩”。安稳，稳定。
(15)威重貌。
(16)宏大。参见“隱虹”。
(17)隐秘之事；私处。
(18)隐语，谜语。
(19)指用隐语暗示。
(20)短墙。
(21)琴上之饰。
(22)通“偃”。堵塞。
(23)通“偃”。仰卧。
(24)通“偃”。犹歇息。
(25)通“殷”。盛多。参见“隱賑”。
(26)通“殷”。震动。
(27)姓。三国吴有隐蕃。见《三国志·吴志·孙登传》裴松之注引《吴书》。
[②]［yìn］
［《廣韻》於靳切，去焮，影。］
“隐2”

隱字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　隱； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1362第15
〔古文〕??【唐韻】【正韻】於謹切【集韻】【韻會】倚謹切，?音櫽。【爾雅·釋詁】隱，微也。【註】微謂逃藏也。【易·乾卦】龍德而隱者也。　又【禮·禮運】大道旣隱。【註】隱猶去也。　又【說文】蔽也。【玉篇】匿也。【論語】言及之而不言，謂之隱。【禮·檀弓】事親有隱而無犯。【魯語】?五而已，無有隱者，隱乃諱也。　又【廣韻】私也。【論語】吾無隱乎爾。【疏】孔子敎人無所隱惜。　又【玉篇】不見也。【易·繫辭】巽稱而隱。【註】稱揚命令，而百姓不知其由。【史記·韓安國傳】壷遂之深中隱厚。　又【禮·曲禮】不以隱疾。【註】隱疾，衣中之疾也。又【史記·秦始皇紀】隱宮徒?者，七十餘萬人。【註】宮?，一百日隱於隂室養之，故曰隱宮。　又【史記·滑稽傳】齊威王之時喜隱。【前漢·藝文志】隱書十八篇。【註】《劉向·別錄》云：隱書者，疑其言以相問，對者以慮思之，可以無不喩。　又【禮·玉藻】隱辟而後屨。【註】隱辟，俛逡巡而退著屨也。　又【爾雅·釋言】隱，占也。【註】隱度。【疏】占者，

小篆楷体

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐn］
["Guangyun" Yu Jinqie, Shang Wei, Ying. ]
Traditional characters of "隐1". Also known as "隠1".
(1) Concealment; hidden.
(2) Cover; cover.
(3) Conceal; conceal.
(4) Profound; subtle.
(5) The light or fire goes out.
(6) Hidden.
(7) Seclusion.
(8) Refers to a person who lives in seclusion.
(9) Quiet. See "Hidden Depth".
(10) Poor.
(11) Sadness; suffering.
(12) Pity; sympathy.
(13) Review; review.
(14) Use the same as "stable". Stable and stable.
(15) Prestige appearance.
(16) Great. See "Hidden Rainbow".
(17) Secret things; private parts.
(18) Hidden words, riddles.
(19) Refers to cryptic suggestion.
(20) Short wall.
(21) Ornaments on the piano.
(22) Through "Yan". Blocked.
(23) Through "Yan". Lie on your back.
(24) Through "Yan". Still resting.
(25) Through "Yin". Shengdo. See "Hidden Relief".
(26) Through "Yin". shock.
(27) Last name. The Three Kingdoms Wu has a hidden fan. See "Three Kingdoms·Wu Zhi·Sun Deng Biography" Pei Songzhi's quotation from "Book of Wu".
[②]［yìn］
["Guang Yun" Yu Jin Qie, go to Yan, film. ]
"Hidden 2"
hidden

【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　 Yin; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1362 Page 15
[Ancient text]?? [Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Yu Jinqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Hui] Lean Jinqie, the sound of sound. 【Erya·Shigu】Hidden, slightly. [Note] Wei Wei said to escape from hiding. [Easy·Qian Gua] Long virtue and hermit are also.　[Li·Li Yun] The main road is hidden. [Note] It's still going to be hidden.　 [Said the text] also cover up. 【Jade articles】Hidden also. 【The Analects of Confucius】Speaking but not saying, it is called hidden. [Li·Tan Gong] Things are hidden but not committed. [Lu Yu]? Only five, there is no hermit, but she is a taboo.　[Guangyun] Private too. [The Analects] I have nothing to hide. 【Sparse】Confucius has nothing to cherish.　[Jade Chapter] I'm not seeing you again. 【Yi·Ci】Sunda is called but hidden. [Note] The command is praised, and the people do not know why. 【Historical Records·Han Anguo Biography】Dai Sui is deep and deep.　[Li·Qi Li] is not a hidden disease. [Note] Hidden diseases, diseases in clothes are also. Also [Historical Records·Qin Shi Huang Ji] There are more than 700,000 people in the Hermitage. [Note] Palace? It is hidden in the yin chamber for a hundred days, so it is called the hidden palace.　[Historical Records·Comical Biography] The time of King Qi Wei hid in joy. 【Former Han·Art and Literature History】Eighteen hidden books. [Note] "Liu Xiang·Bielu" says: Those who conceal the book can ask each other if they doubt what they say, and those who think about it can do everything.　[Li·Yu Zao] concealed and followed. [Note] Hiddenly, I patrol and retreat.　【Erya·Interpretation】Hidden, accounted for. [Note] Hidden degree. 【Sparse】occupier,
